featured.text: The Icelandic project, from which this pioneering procedure emerged, strives for making a fundamental change in the marine industry.
The pilot is responsible for not only the safety of the ship but also the protection of the port and the marine environment.
A marine pilot is a boat pilot with specialized knowledge of a particular port or harbor.

other.text: Without the services of a marine pilot, docking ships would be hazardous.
This captain is called a marine pilot.
Marine pilotage is a job that requires a high degree of proficiency as well as quick and independent thinking.
A marine pilot goes on board at a crucial time and controls the vessel based on his or her knowledge of the port and the situation at hand.
Which of the following is part of the knowledge that a marine pilot must have? (A)

definition.en_def: Relating to the sea; connected with the ocean or sea life.
definition.example: The marine biologist studied the effects of pollution on coral reefs.
